name: Wound Up (Juliayw)
description:
A one week  prototype for Prototype Studio 

Prompt: Make a game based on the song : "Don't Wanna Be"

Drag mouse left or right to rotate the blue knob, by doing this, you can controll the musical ring to move.

No matter what color battery your ring captures, you will get energy. Capture red battery lowers the pitch of the music, while the blue battery raises it. The pitch of the music is too high or too low will end the game,  try to keep the pitch close to the original tune
